questions.question_text: Je tejne vişhe mūrti chhe te ja pratyaksh ______ chhe,' em jāņajo.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.13, 'Je tejne vişhe mūrti chhe te ja pratyaksh Mahārāj chhe,' em jāņajo.

questions.question_text: Evā sarvoparī je Purushottam Bhagwān te ja dayāe karīne jīvonā ______ arthe pruthvīne vishe prakat thayā thakā sarva jannā nayan-gochar varte chhe ne tamārā işhţadev chhe ne tamārī sevāne angīkār kare chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.An.38, Evā sarvoparī je Purushottam Bhagwān te ja dayāe karīne jīvonā kalyāņne arthe pruthvīne vishe prakat thayā thakā sarva jannā nayan-gochar varte chhe ne tamārā işhţadev chhe ne tamārī sevāne angīkār kare chhe.

questions.question_text: Mahārājne Puruṣottam jāṇyā vinā ______ javāy nahī.
questions.explanation: According to Swa.Vato.3/12, Mahārājne Puruṣottam jāṇyā vinā Akṣardhāmmā javāy nahī.

questions.question_text: Sadguru Bhāyātmānand Swāmīno ek prasang ahī vichārīe. Teo ______ mūrti gaṇātā.
questions.explanation: According to ShreejiMahārāj Pragatni.Vato.193, Sadguru Bhāyātmānand Swāmīno ek prasang ahī vichārīe. Teo vachanni mūrti gaṇātā.

questions.question_text: Tyāre Guṇātītānand Swāmī Mahārāje kahyu, ‘Tamne haju Mahārājnā ______ swarūpnī pākī niṣhṭhā thaī nathī.
questions.explanation: According to ShreejiMahārāj Pragatni.Vato.193, Tyāre Guṇātītānand Swāmī Mahārāje kahyu, ‘Tamne haju Mahārājnā sarvoparī swarūpnī pākī niṣhṭhā thaī nathī.

questions.question_text: Lodhikāvāḷā ______ Shrīharinī sarvoparī niṣhṭhā bestī na hatī.
questions.explanation: According to Abhesinh Darbār, Lodhikāvāḷā Abhesinh Darbārne Shrīharinī sarvoparī niṣhṭhā bestī na hatī.

questions.question_text: Swāmī kahe, “Ā ame tamne kahīe chhīe je, Mahārāj ______ chhe. Te amāre vachane karīne māno.”
questions.explanation: According to Abhesinh Darbār, Swāmī kahe, “Ā ame tamne kahīe chhīe je, Mahārāj sarvoparī chhe. Te amāre vachane karīne māno.”

questions.question_text: Ham to ek ______ gāve, Hamāre man Swāminārāyaṇ dūsaro na bhāve... Ham...
questions.explanation: According to Premanand Swāmī, Ham to ek Sahajānand gāve, Hamāre man Swāminārāyaṇ dūsaro na bhāve... Ham...

questions.question_text: Paṇ jiyā̃ lagī prāṇ raheśhe, Jībhā ______ kaheśhe;
questions.explanation: According to Bhaktachintamani.102/48-52, Paṇ jiyā̃ lagī prāṇ raheśhe, Jībhā Swāmī Sahajānand kaheśhe;

questions.question_text: Akṣharapuruṣhottam upāsanā eṭle Akṣhar ane Puruṣhottam – em be tattvonī upāsanā nahī, parantu ______ thaīne Puruṣhottamnī upāsanā; arthāt Brahmarūp thaīne Parabrahmnī upāsanā.
questions.explanation: According to Pramukh Swami Maharaj, Akṣharapuruṣhottam upāsanā eṭle Akṣhar ane Puruṣhottam – em be tattvonī upāsanā nahī, parantu Akṣharrūp thaīne Puruṣhottamnī upāsanā; arthāt Brahmarūp thaīne Parabrahmnī upāsanā.
